Kenney Game Assets: Audio Pack

Source:
- https://kenney.nl/assets/audio-pack

Author / Publisher:
- Kenney (https://kenney.nl/)

License:
- CC0 1.0 Universal (see LICENSE_CC0-1.0.txt in this folder, or https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)

Retrieved:
- 2026-01-27

Notes:
- This repository only ingests a curated subset of audio files needed for Build A (UI clicks, build placement/invalid/demolish/destroyed sounds).
- Audio files are normalized to the game's volume expectations (see sound map in agent_14 log).
- Used for: UI clicks, building placement/invalid/demolish/destroyed sounds
